gems.name: google-cloud-dataplex-v1
gems.info: Dataplex is an intelligent data fabric that provides a way to centrally manage, monitor, and govern your data across data lakes, data warehouses and data marts, and make this data securely accessible to a variety of analytics and data science tools. Note that google-cloud-dataplex-v1 is a version-specific client library. For most uses, we recommend installing the main client library google-cloud-dataplex instead. See the readme for more details.
